item.title: Release notes from grafana: 10.1.0 (2023-08-01)
item.content:encoded:
Download page
What's new highlights

Features and enhancements

  • Usage stats: Tune collector execution startup and interval. #72790, @papagian
  • Prometheus: Add support for day_of_year. #72403, @gtk-grafana
  • Transforms: Add Alpha Format Time Transform. #72319, @codeincarnate
  • Prometheus: Add present_over_time syntax highlighting. #72283, @arnaudlemaignen
  • Login: Show oauth error messages inline. #72255, @RoxanaAnamariaTurc
  • Geomap: Promote route + photos layer to beta, promote geojson layer to stable. #72233, @nmarrs
  • Dashboards: Add Angular deprecation alert in data source query editor. #72211, @xnyo
  • Auth: Lock organization roles for users who are managed through an external auth provider. #72204, @IevaVasiljeva
  • Tranformations: True OUTER JOIN in the join by field transformation used for tabular data . #72176, @bohandley
  • NestedFolders: Enable new nested folder picker by default for nested folders. #72129, @joshhunt
  • Alerting: Add dashboardUID and panelID query parameters for loki state history. #72119, @alexweav
  • Feature toggles management: Define get feature toggles api. #72106, @jcalisto
  • Prometheus: Turn browser resource cache on by default. #72105, @gtk-grafana
  • Alerting: Improve alerts names visibility on narrow panels. #72104, @konrad147
  • Data Sources: Remove Admin/Data sources page in favour of Connections/Data sources. #72102, @mikkancso
  • Loki: Enable Query Splitting by default. #72094, @matyax
  • AuthN: Lock down manual role updates for users synced through Grafana Com portal. #72044, @IevaVasiljeva
  • Tempo: Remove traceqlSearch feature toggle. #72029, @adrapereira
  • Alerting: Keep legacy alert rule maxDataPoints and intervalMs during migration. #71989, @JacobsonMT
  • Alerting: Add min interval option to alert rule query creation. #71986, @JacobsonMT
  • Alerting: Add View YAML button for Grafana/provisioned rules. #71983, @VikaCep
  • Plugin: Remove error on invalid version. #71951, @oshirohugo
  • Traces: Enable showing trace ids. #71950, @gabor
  • RBAC: Split non-empty scopes into kind, attribute and identifier fields for better search performance. #71933, @IevaVasiljeva
  • Adminstration: Feature toggle for feature toggle admin page. #71887, @IbrahimCSAE
  • Alerting: Improve performance of matching captures. #71828, @grobinson-grafana
  • CommandPalette: Remove parent search and fuzzy search for pages. #71825, @tskarhed
  • Tracing: Remove newTraceViewHeader feature toggle. #71818, @joey-grafana
  • FlameGraph: Add column in table with buttons to filter and sandwich a symbol. #71773, @aocenas
  • Units: Added support for Candela (cd). #71696, @Frankkkkk
  • Alerting: Add contact point provisioning file export. #71692, @JacobsonMT
  • Redshift: Support caching async aws queries. #71682, @iwysiu
  • Alerting: Save and restore condition reference while switching type. #71629, @soniaAguilarPeiron
  • Explore: Remove exploreMixedDatasource feature toggle. #71534, @Elfo404
  • OAuth: Introduce user_refresh_token setting and make it default for the selected providers. #71533, @mgyongyosi
  • Alerting: Adds support for toggling common labels. #71497, @gillesdemey
  • Plugin: Validate plugin version on installation. #71488, @oshirohugo
  • Explore: Replaced deprecated 'query' property with 'queries' in splitOpen. #71484, @harisrozajac
  • Plugins: Remove logs button instead of disabling it. #71448, @fabrizio-grafana
  • Traces: Add inline validation and greater precision to duration fields in span filters. #71404, @joey-grafana
  • Alert: Change error icon to exclamation-circle. #71397, @torkelo
  • Field Config: Add new units (mŒ©, kHz, MHz, GHz, ac, ha). #71357, @Develer
  • Plugins: Fail plugins installation on wrong args provided. #71355, @oshirohugo
  • Logs: Display log row menu cell on displayed fields. #71300, @matyax
  • Auth: Move LDAP debug to Authentication menu. #71285, @Jguer
  • AzureMonitor: Add switch to control time-range for Logs queries. #71278, @aangelisc
  • Alerting: Changes to evaluation group step. #71251, @VikaCep
  • PanelInspect: Clean table display settings from field config. #71226, @torkelo
  • QueryBuilder: Preserve queries when switching from Mixed. #71224, @aangelisc
  • Public Dashboard: Redesign modal (v2). #71151, @polibb
  • Tracing: Add services, depth to span filters metadata. #71084, @joey-grafana
  • PluginExtensions: Add category to link extensions. #71074, @mckn
  • Alerting: Add smart type selection when creating a new alert rule. #71071, @soniaAguilarPeiron
  • Alerting: Keep rule form buttons always on top. #71056, @VikaCep
  • Feat: Match allowed cookies with optional character. #71047, @itsmylife
  • Plugins: Add feature toggle for Temporary Credentials. #71033, @idastambuk
  • Tracing: Show next/prev buttons when span filters are collapsed. #71025, @joey-grafana
  • Heatmap: Add datalink support. #71016, @kureshimiru
  • Table: Add custom cell rendering option. #70999, @aocenas
  • Alerting: Use new "Label" components for alert instance labels. #70997, @gillesdemey
  • Prometheus: Add disableRecordingRules datasource config. #70903, @shantanualsi
  • Alerting: Use ToggleTip instead of Hovercard in the info popup on Math expressions. #70881, @soniaAguilarPeiron
  • Alerting: Improve time range and max data points info in QueryEditor. #70867, @VikaCep
  • A11y: Do not force colors in the color swatch and icon series. #70862, @evictorero
  • A11y: Add support for toggle buttons in high contrast mode. #70838, @evictorero
  • LogContext: Make centered row unsticky on click. #70832, @svennergr
  • LogContext: Add button to scroll to center. #70821, @svennergr
  • Alerting: Render folder selector in options for Alert List Panel only when having Grafana datasource. #70816, @soniaAguilarPeiron
  • Connections console: Add Angular badge for Angular plugins. #70789, @xnyo
  • Flamegraph: Add switch for color scheme by value or by package. #70770, @aocenas
  • Auth: Enforce role sync except if skip org role sync is enabled. #70766, @Jguer
  • AuthZ: Extend /api/search to work with self-contained permissions. #70749, @mgyongyosi
  • Login: Adjust error message when user exceed login attempts. #70736, @RoxanaAnamariaTurc
  • Nested folders: Paginate child folder items. #70730, @ashharrison90
  • Units: Add events/messages/records/rows throughput units. #70726, @hhromic
  • Plugins: Enable feature toggles for long running queries by deafult. #70678, @idastambuk
  • I18n: Translate phrases for new Browse Dashboards. #70654, @Bohdanator
  • Flamegraph: Prevent cropping of tooltip by bottom of the viewport. #70633, @aocenas
  • Pyroscope: Preselect default profile type or app in the query editor dropdown. #70624, @aocenas
  • Trend: Support disconnect values and connect nulls options. #70616, @drew08t
  • StateTimeline: Add disconnect value option. #70610, @drew08t
  • DSPicker: Use new DS picker everywhere. #70609, @ivanortegaalba
  • Alerting: Reduce number of unnecessary request in the alert list panel in case ‚Ä¶. #70583, @soniaAguilarPeiron
  • Docs: Update query and resource caching documentation to improve clarity and add additional context. #70556, @mmandrus
  • Alerting: Adds in-app documentation for Classic Conditions. #70540, @grobinson-grafana
  • Alerting: Display a warning when a contact point is not in use. #70506, @konrad147
  • Dashboards: Support an auto refresh interval that is based on the query range. #70479, @ryantxu
  • Loki: Preserve pipeline stages in context query. #70472, @svennergr
  • Logs: Link anchored logline when opening context in split view. #70463, @svennergr
  • Prometheus: Add capability to filter label names by metric in template variable editor. #70452, @gtk-grafana
  • Alerting: Expression card improvements. #70395, @soniaAguilarPeiron
  • Logs: Show active state of "filter for value" buttons in Logs Details. #70328, @matyax
  • Loki: Deprecate resolution . #70326, @ivanahuckova
  • PanelPlugin: Allow hiding standard field config from defaults. #70303, @dprokop
  • InteractiveTable: Add pagination and header tooltips. #70281, @abannachGrafana
  • FlameGraph: Add sandwich view. #70268, @aocenas
  • Login: Show error messages inline in form instead of in toasts. #70266, @joshhunt
  • Elasticsearch: Enable logs samples for metric queries. #70258, @gwdawson
  • Geomap: Add network layer. #70192, @drew08t
  • Alerting: Bump grafana/alerting and refactor the ImageStore/Provider to provide image URL/bytes. #70182, @santihernandezc
  • Auth: Support google OIDC and group fetching. #70140, @Jguer
  • Alerting: Make QueryEditor not collapsable. #70112, @VikaCep
  • TimeSeries: Add option to disconnect values. #70097, @drew08t
  • Logs: Add toggle behavior support for "filter for" and "filter out" label within Logs Details. #70091, @matyax
  • Plugins: Periodically update public signing key. #70080, @andresmgot
  • Navigation: Add navigation customization options to config documentation. #70072, @ashharrison90
  • Config: Add configuration option to define custom user-facing general error message for certain error types. #70023, @mmandrus
  • Alerting: Add notification policy provisioning file export. #70009, @JacobsonMT
  • CloudWatch: Add missing EventBridge Pipe metrics. #69994, @rrhodes
  • SSE: Support for ML query node. #69963, @yuri-tceretian
  • Database: Make dialects independent of xorm Engine. #69955, @DanCech
  • Mysql Tests: For mysql5.7 integration tests use utf8mb4 charset. #69953, @owensmallwood
  • Alerting: Show disabled provisioned evaluation group. #69932, @gillesdemey
  • Auth: Support Gitlab OIDC scopes. #69890, @Jguer
  • InfluxDB: Backend parser compatibility with frontend parser. #69865, @itsmylife
  • PublicDashboards: Audit table pagination. #69823, @juanicabanas
  • CloudWatch: Add missing AWS/FSx metrics. #69816, @kevinwcyu
  • Variables: Show description instead of definition in table. #69786, @ivanahuckova
  • Alerting: Repurpose rule testing endpoint to return potential alerts. #69755, @JacobsonMT
  • NestedFolders: Move New folder into a drawer. #69706, @ashharrison90
  • Loki: Implement step editor. #69648, @ivanahuckova
  • DataFrame: Align frame (series.name) and field naming (field.name) . #69621, @torkelo
  • Auth: Use auth broker by default. #69620, @Jguer
  • Dashboards: Add dashboard embed route. #69596, @Clarity-89
  • Nested folders: Improve loading states. #69556, @ashharrison90
  • Alerting: Use monaco editor for admin page. #69514, @gillesdemey
  • Legend: Sort by name. #69490, @adela-almasan
  • QueryField: Set default value for onBlur prop. #69487, @idastambuk
  • Tempo: TraceQL editor - Match type of new values with values in dropdown. #69468, @adrapereira
  • Logs: Add permalink to log lines. #69464, @svennergr
  • Logs: Implement "infinite" scrolling in log context. #69459, @gabor
  • Tracing: Use new DataSourceDescription component. #69443, @joey-grafana
  • Plugin Extensions: Custom limits for extensions-per-plugin . #69430, @leventebalogh
  • Alerting: Display error if repeat interval is lower than group interval. #69413, @VikaCep
  • Tracing: Move upload trace to button. #69402, @adrapereira
  • I18n: Add server config to detect browser language. #69396, @pbaumard
  • Tempo: Represent OTLP Span Intrinsics correctly. #69394, @joey-grafana
  • News: Expose config option to disable News feed. #69365, @ashharrison90
  • Alerting: Change how we display annotations in the rule form. #69338, @VikaCep
  • Azure: AzureMonitorMetrics - change response to be dataplane compliant. #69308, @kylebrandt
  • JoinDataFrames: Keep field name if possible. #69289, @ryantxu
  • Dashboards: Data source template variable options now specify a current value using uid. #69259, @darrenjaneczek
  • Alerting: Add more context to delete modals. #69244, @gillesdemey
  • Plugins: Forbid loading Angular plugins when Angular is disabled. #69225, @xnyo
  • Tempo: TraceQL query response streaming. #69212, @adrapereira
  • Catalog: Display badges for Angular plugins and disable install if Angular is disabled. #69084, @xnyo
  • Chore: Adding "allowed_groups" Configuration Parameter to Generic OAuth Method. #69025, @vsychov
  • Loki: Add support for distinct operation in autocomplete and query builder. #69003, @matyax
  • Chore: Avoid unnecessary byte/string conversions. #69001, @Juneezee
  • Loki: Implement decolorize logql operation. #68972, @ivanahuckova
  • CloudWatch: Wrap VariableEditor dimension fields. #68967, @iSatVeerSingh
  • TimeSeries: Add zoom-out functionality on double click. #68936, @simPod
  • Plugins: Bump Plugin SDK version and address instance management breaking changes. #68900, @wbrowne
  • FlameGraph: Add option to align text left or right. #68893, @aocenas
  • Logs: Added copy-to-clipboard fallback support and visual feedback after copying. #68874, @matyax
  • Auth: Respect cache control for JWKS in auth.jwt. #68872, @Jguer
  • Pyroscope: Rename phlare to grafana-pyroscope-datasource. #68859, @ryantxu
  • Alerting: Add notification policies preview in alert creation. #68839, @soniaAguilarPeiron
  • Page: Add inline rename functionality. #68828, @ashharrison90
  • Tracing: Rename reset to clear for consistency. #68821, @joey-grafana
  • Alerting: Adds support for timezones in mute timings. #68813, @gillesdemey
  • Datasources: Deprecate and log creating/updating datasources with invalid UIDs. #68800, @xnyo
  • Tracing: Upgrade tracing data source configuration editors. #68764, @joey-grafana
  • Loki: Preserve pre-selected labels in the log context UI. #68700, @ivanahuckova
  • NestedFolders: Improve performance of Browse Dashboards by loading one page at a time. #68617, @joshhunt
  • Plugins: Add a new UI Extension type. #68600, @leventebalogh
  • StateTimeline: Support hideFrom field config. #68586, @ryantxu
  • Chore: Remove alpha icon panel. #68573, @nmarrs
  • PublicDashboards: Support timezone on query API. #68560, @evictorero
  • API: Add deprecation notice for updating folder UID. #68543, @papagian
  • Accessibility: Make QueryOptions in Phlare and Parca accessible. #68515, @joey-grafana
  • Chore: Test datasource to support template $seriesIndex in label values. #68497, @yuri-tceretian
  • Loki: Add functionality to revert to initial query in log context. #68484, @ivanahuckova
  • Alerting: Reorder new alert and export buttons. #68418, @VikaCep
  • Accessibility: Prevent TimePickerContent overflowing page height. #68356, @ashharrison90
  • Build: Update plugin installation in custom Dockerfile. #68310, @hoptical
  • Alerting: Enable alerts preview on notification policies page. #68291, @konrad147
  • Accessibility: Adds aria tags to VizTooltip so screen readers announce them. #68247, @JoaoSilvaGrafana
  • Breadcrumbs: Don't add breadcrumb for the current tab. #68230, @torkelo
  • NewsDrawer: Add grot to news drawer (after news items) . #68173, @torkelo
  • Tempo: Integrate scoped tags API. #68106, @joey-grafana
  • Auth: Use PKCE by default (If OAuth provider supports PKCE). #68095, @arukiidou
  • Accessibility: Add Skip to content link. #68065, @ashharrison90
  • Auth: Add alpha version of the Extended JWT client . #67999, @mgyongyosi
  • Alerting: Add option for memberlist label. #67982, @JohnnyQQQQ
  • Breadcrumbs: Improve responsiveness. #67955, @torkelo
  • PluginExtensions: Expose scopedVars via the context to plugins that extends the dashboard panel menu. #67917, @mckn
  • Trace View: Rename span detail attribute sections. #67849, @adrapereira
  • Chore: Upgrade Go to 1.20.4. #67748, @papagian
  • Correlations: Add links to prometheus dataframe where labels are split out. #67736, @gelicia
  • Theme: Change dark theme borders to improve contrast on primary background. #67699, @torkelo
  • Alerting: Refactor the ImageStore/Provider to provide image URL/bytes. #67693, @santihernandezc
  • Alerting: Allow to tab onto elements for a11y. #67684, @VikaCep
  • Grafana: Upgrades mysql images from 5.7 to 8. #67604, @owensmallwood
  • Chore: Bump github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql from 1.6.0 to 1.7.1. #67584
  • Frontend logging: Remove Sentry javascript agent support. #67493, @domasx2
  • HTTP: Add TLS version configurability for grafana server. #67482, @venkatbvc
  • NestedFolders: Use new Browse Dashboards UI behind feature flag. #67416, @joshhunt
  • CloudWatch: Remove dynamic labels feature toggle. #67371, @fridgepoet
  • Suggestions: Prioritize preferred visualizations for suggestion list. #67326, @sarahzinger
  • Explore: Allow the use of plugin panels. #66982, @Umaaz
  • Grafana/ui: Add UserIcon and UsersIndicator components. #66906, @Clarity-89
  • Connections: Simplify connections nav. #66813, @torkelo
  • Variables: Add support for $__timezone template variable. #66785, @VictorColomb
  • Design System: Refactor IconButton and update documentation. #66774, @L-M-K-B
  • CloudWatch: Update metric stat editor to match aws statistics. #66532, @sladyn98
  • Chore: Replace go-multierror with errors package. #66432, @iSatVeerSingh
  • Explore: Make toolbar action extendable by plugins. #65524, @mckn
  • Loki: Add the ability to prettify logql queries. #64337, @gwdawson
  • TimeSeries / StateTimeline: Add support for rendering enum fields. #64179, @leeoniya
  • Elasticsearch: Improve query type selection. #63402, @gabor
  • Metrics: Update Help to mention active viewers. #63384, @monteiro-renato
  • MySQL: Add option to allow cleartext passwords. #63232, @enginecan
  • Platform: Add support for Postgresql pgpass file. #61517, @gjacquet
  • ServiceAccounts: Add secret scan service docs. #57926, @Jguer
  • Azure: Configuration for user identity authentication in datasources (Experimental). #50277, @kostrse
  • Mysql Tests: Mysql5.7 integration tests, use utf8mb4 charset. (Enterprise)
  • RBAC: Validate provided Action for Create/Update Role. (Enterprise)
  • Reports: Activate draft reports. (Enterprise)
  • Grafana: Upgrades mysql images from 5.7 to 8. (Enterprise)
  • Usage Insights: Use the insights components from grafana/ui. (Enterprise)

Bug fixes

  • DataSourceProxy: Fix url validation error handling. #73322, @ricci2511
  • AzureMonitor: Allow serviceTags and tags to be empty for trace results. #73197, @aangelisc
  • UserSync: Avoid UpdateLastSeenAt with invalid user ids. #72784, @ryantxu
  • Nested folders: Fix search query for empty self-contained permissions. #72733, @papagian
  • Auth: Lock down Grafana admin role updates if the role is externally synced. #72691, @IevaVasiljeva
  • DS Picker: Ignore capitalization when sorting dropdown list. #72668, @ivanortegaalba
  • Logs: Fix ui getting stuck when removing fields. #72603, @ivanahuckova
  • Data sources: Dashboards page now loads correctly from direct url. #72495, @ashharrison90
  • Provisioning: Fix overwrite SecureJSONData on provisioning. #72455, @oshirohugo
  • Loki: Run logs volume for query when switching from trace to logs. #72268, @ivanahuckova
  • Alerting: Fix refetching grafana rules on alert list panel. #72242, @konrad147
  • Alerting: Fix contact point testing with secure settings. #72235, @JacobsonMT
  • Alerting: Exclude expression refIDs from NoData state. #72219, @yuri-tceretian
  • Alerting: Fix state manager to not keep datasource_uid and ref_id labels in state after Error. #72216, @yuri-tceretian
  • Dashboards: Fix small drop target for importing dashboards. #72170, @kunxl-gg
  • TimeSeries: Fix zoom not working after editing panel. #72163, @leeoniya
  • Dashboard: New Datasource picker link is keyboard accessible. #72134, @polibb
  • CloudMonitoring: Correctly set title and text fields for annotations. #71888, @aangelisc
  • AzureMonitor: Fix ResourcePicker hanging. #71886, @asimpson
  • Fix: Hide Forward OAuth Identity toggle when azure auth is enabled. #71640, @itsmylife
  • Flamegraph: Fix wrong positioning of tooltip in dashboards. #71396, @aocenas
  • Dashboards: Save tags on dashboard creation. #71394, @evictorero
  • A11y: Fix keyboard accessibility in LayerDragDropList. #71386, @Develer
  • DataLinks: Fix bug where links which used built in variables could be hidden. #71372, @aocenas
  • LogContext: Fix a bug where multiple logs with similar nanosecond timestamps were loaded too often. #71319, @svennergr
  • Dashboard: Slider overlapping with right input field. #71282, @Develer
  • Alerting: Support spaces in alert names for creating silence links. #71280, @gillesdemey
  • Swagger: Fix response for the search users endpoint. #71272, @papagian
  • Auth: Fix US gov azure ad oauth URL parsing. #71254, @douglasryanadams
  • SSE: DSNode to update result with names to make each value identifiable by labels (only Graphite and TestData). #71246, @yuri-tceretian
  • PanelChrome: Fixes issues with hover header and resizing panel above. #71040, @torkelo
  • Dashboard: Add suggestion box for Flame Graph. #70763, @fabrizio-grafana
  • Slug: Use urlencoding to support non-ASCII characters. #70691, @sakjur
  • Checkbox: Fix alignment in Safari. #70673, @ashharrison90
  • Alerting: Fixes clone url for instances hosted on sub path. #70543, @gillesdemey
  • Alerting: Support concurrent queries for saving alert instances. #70525, @grobinson-grafana
  • Dashboards: Allow dashboards with same name in different folders. #70378, @joshhunt
  • Query: Fix concurrency handling for mixed datasource queries. #70100, @mmandrus
  • Alerting: Allow executing "hidden" queries. #70064, @gillesdemey
  • EchoBackend: Make EchoSrvTransport batched. #70012, @kpelelis
  • CodeEditor: Ensure suggestions only apply to the instance of the editor that registered them. #69995, @ashharrison90
  • NestedFolders: Ensure New dashboard page has the correct breadcrumb hierarchy. #69758, @ashharrison90
  • Transformations: Config overrides being lost when config from query transform is applied. #69720, @IbrahimCSAE
  • Azure: Fix Kusto auto-completion for Azure datasources. #69685, @aangelisc
  • Loki: Fix parsing of escaped quotes in LogQL. #69584, @svennergr
  • Loki: Fix showing of correct line limit in options. #69572, @ivanahuckova
  • Alerting: Fix notification policies inheritance algorithm. #69304, @gillesdemey
  • Checkbox: Fix extraneous right hand margin when no label is present. #68885, @ashharrison90
  • Preferences: Can reset timezone preference back to default correctly. #68881, @ashharrison90
  • Azuremonitor: Multi resource fix. #68759, @bossinc
  • AzureMonitor: Support multi-resource aliases and subscription aliases. #68648, @aangelisc
  • Revert: Allow editors to access GET /datasources. #68632, @eleijonmarck
  • MySQL: Use transaction_isolation instead of tx_isolation. #68575, @owensmallwood
  • Logs: Change logic creating uid in LogRowModel. #68569, @ivanahuckova
  • Dashboard: Re-align Save form. #68565, @polibb
  • Elasticsearch: Implement filter query to not run hidden queries trough backend. #68563, @ivanahuckova
  • Elasticsearch: Fix passing of limit and datalinks to logs data frame. #68554, @ivanahuckova
  • Dashboards: Improve delete dashboard performance due to slow annotations query. #68544, @17billion
  • Elasticsearch: Handle no-index case in backend mode. #68534, @gabor
  • GrafanaUI: Support Tooltip as Dropdown child. #68521, @joshhunt
  • Node graph: Fix req/s in value. #68441, @domasx2
  • FlameGraph: Debounce search update preventing too frequent rerenders . #68405, @aocenas
  • Settings: Add ability to override skip_org_role_sync with Env variables. #68364, @eleijonmarck
  • DarkTheme: Fix dark theme shadows. #68358, @torkelo
  • Heatmap: Fix color rendering for value ranges < 1. #68156, @leeoniya
  • AzureMonitor: Clear queries if header value changes. #67916, @aangelisc
  • AzureMonitor: Fix logs query multi-resource and timespan values. #67914, @aangelisc
  • CloudWatch: Use grafana-aws-sdk v0.15.0. #67876, @iwysiu
  • Datasource: Fix missing raw SQL query in Query Inspector when query returns zero rows. #67844, @baldm0mma
  • LibraryPanels: Don't include ScopedVars with persisted model. #67843, @kaydelaney
  • Elasticsearch: Fix processing of logs with not-recognized time format. #67767, @ivanahuckova
  • Google Cloud Monitor: Fix mem usage for dropdown. #67683, @asimpson
  • Cloudwatch Logs: Ignore non-time grouping fields in expressions and alerts. #67608, @iwysiu
  • Correlations: Enable traceView formatted links. #67160, @gelicia
  • SQL Datasources: Reinstate SQL data source behavior around database selection when default configured databases already exist. #65659, @baldm0mma
  • API: Fix status code when starring already starred dashboard. #63478, @MTLChrisLEE
  • Dashboard: Update query group options. #63138, @songhn233

Breaking changes

This change impacts all instances that use external authentication providers to manage users and organization role assignments.

From Grafana 10.1, it will no longer be possible to manually update organization roles (Viewer, Editor and Admin) that are managed by an external auth provider. We are making this change to clearly separate between roles managed by an external auth provider and manually assigned roles, which increases security and clarity around role management.

If you prefer to manually set user organization roles, use skip_org_role_sync option in the Grafana configuration file of your OAuth provider.

Refer to the release notes of Grafana 9.5 for context on the previous work done to build up to this change. Issue #72204

This change impacts GitHub OAuth, Gitlab OAuth, Okta OAuth and Generic OAuth

Currently if no organization role mapping is found for a user when connecting via OAuth, Grafana doesn‚Äôt update the user‚Äôs organization role.

With Grafana 10.1, on every login, if the role_attribute_path property does not return a role, then the user is assigned the role specified by the auto_assign_org_role option.

To avoid overriding manually set roles, enable the skip_org_role_sync option in the Grafana configuration for your OAuth provider. Issue #70766

InfluxDB backend parser returns incompatible data with frontend. The data was being parsed by frontend and we moving towards migrating InfluxDB fully backend. One caveat is Frontend is generating data frames with fields Time and Value. The backend parser, however, generates time and value. This is causing issues and inconsistencies for the features (i.e. transformations) relying on those. In order to have a unique approach we choose to support what most of the users already have. Existing Transformations that depend on time fields have to be updated to use Time fields. Issue #69865

For accessibility reasons tooltip or aria-label are now required properties for IconButton. In order to continue to use IconButton, you must ensure all IconButton components have a corresponding tooltip or aria-label text. The tooltip text will also be used as the aria-label if you didn't set one separately. In case you add an aria-label the IconButton will not show a tooltip. Issue #69699

The implementation for template macro ${__series.name} was not always correct, resulting in an interpolation that was very different from the series name displayed in the visualization. We have now fixed this issue so that it does show the same name. Depending on how ${__series.name} is used this could result in a minor breaking change. Issue #69621

The data source template variable type has changed the way it represents its options. The text field still represents the data source name, but the value has been changed to the uid of the data source. This allows dashboards to declare the currently selected option by uid, however it changes how a datasource template variable value will be rendered by default. If the name of the data source is expected, the variable syntax will have to be changed to specify the text format.

For example, given a data source variable (datasourceVariable), the following string:

${datasourceVariable}<br/>
Name: ${datasourceVariable:text}<br/>
UID: ${datasourceVariable:raw}

was previously interpolated as:

grafanacloud-k8smonitoring-prom
Name: grafanacloud-k8smonitoring-prom
UID: grafanacloud-k8smonitoring-prom

After these changes, it's interpolated as:

d7bbe725-9e48-4af8-a0cb-6cb255d873a3
Name: grafanacloud-k8smonitoring-prom
UID: d7bbe725-9e48-4af8-a0cb-6cb255d873a3

Any dashboards that are relying on the data source name being returned by ${datasourceVariable} will have to update all their usages to ${datasourceVariable:text} in order to get the previous behavior.

Affected use cases:

  • Using ${datasourceVariable} to display the data source name in text panel or in the panel title.
  • Using ${datasourceVariable} to use the data source name as part of the query content.

Unaffected use cases:

  • Using the ${datasourceVariable} to choose which data source to use for a query (through its data source picker) will not be affected since it can use both the name and the uid Issue #69259

We are changing the logic that creates uid in LogRowModel. Previously, for uid we used id field from log's data frame. Unfortunately, when users run multiple queries that returned duplicate logs data, uid was not unique which was causing bugs. To make uid unique across multiple queries that return duplicate logs data, we are now prepending uid with refId of query that produced the log line. We recommend not to rely on LogRowModel uid and instead use dataFrame id field. Issue #68569

The deprecated support for monitoring Grafana frontend using Sentry javascript agent has been removed in this release. If you have frontend logging enabled and are sending telemetry to Sentry by setting sentry_dsn configuration property, this will no longer work. Otherwise, if frontend logging is enabled, it will now automatically use Grafana Faro agent. Issue #67493

Deprecations

The query parameter of Explore's SplitOpen function is deprecated (passed in mapInternalLinkToExplore). Please use the queries parameter instead, which allows passing multiple queries to SplitOpen function. To pass a single query to SplitOpen function, set the queries parameter to an array containing that single query.

Fixes: #62567 Issue #71484

Starting with 10.0, changing the folder UID is deprecated. It will be removed in a future release. Please avoid using it because it can result in folder losing its permissions. Issue #68543

Plugin development fixes & changes

  • GrafanaUI: Define tooltip or aria-label as required for IconButton. #69699, @L-M-K-B
  • Select: Performance improvements when opening menu and when hovering over options. #69230, @JoaoSilvaGrafana
  • ConfirmModal: Ignore case for confirmation text. #69000, @ashharrison90
  • Grafana/ui: Fix margin in RadioButtonGroup option when only icon is present. #68899, @aocenas

This is a Testnet release. It is recommended for up to 10% of Mainnet Beta

v1.16 removes solana-sys-tuner. For manual tuning please see these System Tuning instructions

  • In previous v1.16 releases, the TransactionStatus and AddressSignatures columns were not properly cleaned. This could have resulted in excessive storage use for nodes running with --enable-rpc-transaction-history. This has been fixed with #32548

item.title: Release notes from scala: Scala 2.13.11
item.content:encoded:
The Scala team at Lightbend is pleased to announce Scala 2.13.11.

The following changes are highlights of this release:

Collections

  • Faster Vector concatenation (#10159 by @ansvonwa)
  • New LinkedHashMap/LinkedHashSet implementation (#10221 by @liang3zy22)

Compatibility

  • Support JDK 20 and 21 by upgrading to ASM 9.5 (#10363, #10184 by @Philippus)
  • Fix crash reading JDK 21 classfiles (#10397)
  • Support Java 17 sealed in Java sources and classfiles (#10348, #10105 by @som-snytt)
  • Support Scala 3.3 in TASTy reader (#10299 by @bishabosha)

Align with Scala 3

  • Accept implicit _, implicit (x: Int) in lambdas, like Scala 3 does (#10327 by @som-snytt)
  • Deprecate infix type args, as they are dropped in Scala 3 (#10255 by @som-snytt)
  • Allow eta-expansion of methods with dependent types (#10166)
  • Abstract parent copy does not suspend case copy (#10085 by @som-snytt)
  • Don't GLB binders of type patterns, use the type directly (#10247)
  • Under -Xsource:3, warn that inherited members no longer take precedence over outer definitions in Scala 3 (#10220, #10339)
  • Under -Xsource:3, adjust 2.13.9 change to ignore override type for whitebox macro expansion (#10188 by @som-snytt)
  • Under -Xsource:3, use narrowest type for pt of override (#10198 by @som-snytt)
  • Under -Xsource:3, warn about change to parenless lambda parens (#10320 by @som-snytt)

Lints and warnings

  • Lint select from Unit, or Int that incurs widening (#10372 by @som-snytt)
  • Lint for integral divisions that are widened to a float (#10369 by @som-snytt)
  • Lint if args adapted to Unit and discarded (#10150 by @som-snytt)
  • Warn that implicit should have explicit type (#10083 by @som-snytt)

Other notable changes

  • Disallow mixins where super calls bind to vals (#10268)
  • Make scalac's argument-file processing more like javac's in handling spaces and line breaks (#10319 by @som-snytt)
  • Bump JLine and JNA versions (#10318)
  • javabootclasspath supersedes jrt (#10336 by @som-snytt)
  • Report total errors on stderr (#10272 by @som-snytt)
  • Fix pathologically slow compilation of some pattern matches since 2.13.7 (#10258 by @KisaragiEffective)
  • Provide equals and hashCode on IterableWrapper again (fixing 2.13.9 regression) (#10205 by @som-snytt)
  • Improvements to -Vimplicits; errors now show complete implicit search tree (#9944 by @tribbloid)
  • -Vprint defaults to -Vprint:typer; phases may be prefixed with ~ to mean "before and after" (#10173 by @som-snytt)

2.13.11 also includes the changes from Scala 2.12.18. (A few of the most significant, such as those involving JDK 20 and 21 compatibility, are listed above.)

For the complete 2.13.11 change lists, see all merged PRs and all closed bugs.

Known issues

A few regressions have been discovered:

  • Exhaustivity checker emits spurious warning when matching on Java enum type (2.13.11 regression) (scala/bug#12800)
  • Duplicated @Deprecated annotations when extending Java interface with deprecated default method cause java.lang.annotation.AnnotationFormatError when accessed via Java reflection (2.13.11 regression) (scala/bug#12799)

We'll address these in Scala 2.13.12.

Compatibility

As usual for our minor releases, Scala 2.13.11 is binary-compatible with the whole Scala 2.13 series.

Upgrading from 2.12? Enable -Xmigration while upgrading to request migration advice from the compiler.

Contributors

A big thank you to everyone who's helped improve Scala by reporting bugs, improving our documentation, spreading kindness in discussions around Scala, and submitting and reviewing pull requests! You are all magnificent.

We especially acknowledge and thank A. P. Marki, also known as Som Snytt, who is responsible for a large share of the improvements in this release.

This release was brought to you by 28 contributors, according to git shortlog -sn --no-merges @ ^v2.13.10 ^2.12.x. Thank you A. P. Marki, Lukas Rytz, Seth Tisue, Anselm von Wangenheim, Scala Steward, Liang Yan, Jamie Thompson, jxnu-liguobin, AminMal, Jason Zaugg, Kenji Yoshida, Rituraj, ashish, Chris Kipp, Dale Wijnand, Francesco Kriegel, Georgi Chochov, Goooler, Jo√£o Costa, Kisaragi Marine, Rafa≈Ç Sumis≈Çawski, Ruslans Tarasovs, Simon R, S√©bastien Doeraene, Tomasz Godzik, Zhang Zhipeng, danarmak, hepin.p.

Thanks to Lightbend for their continued sponsorship of the Scala 2 team‚Äôs efforts. Lightbend offers commercial support for Scala.

Scala 2.13 notes

The release notes for Scala 2.13.0 have important information applicable to the whole 2.13 series.

Obtaining Scala

Scala releases are available through a variety of channels, including (but not limited to):

  • Bump the scalaVersion setting in your sbt project
  • Bump the using scala setting in your Scala-CLI project
  • Download a distribution from scala-lang.org
  • Obtain JARs via Maven Central

item.title: Release notes from pixijs: v8.0.0-alpha.2
item.content:encoded:
üö® WARNING üö®

This project is currently highly experimental and subject to large changes before we reach an official launch.

‚ÑπÔ∏è INFO

This release heavily focused on providing backwards compatibility from v7, therefore this release is a much better jumping in point for anyone curious about trying out the new version!

item.title: Release notes from pandoc: pandoc 3.1.6.2
item.content:encoded:
Click to expand changelog

  • Org reader: allow example lines to end immediately after the colon (Brian Leung).

  • Docx reader:

    • Omit ‚ÄúTable NN‚Äù from caption (#9002).
    • Avoid spurious block quotes in list items (#8836).

  • JATS reader: Fix display of block elements (#8889, Julia Diaz). A number of block elements, like disp-quote, list, and disp-formula, were always treated as inlines if appearing inside paragraphs, even if their usage granted a separate block.

  • HTML reader: avoid duplicate id on header and div (#8991).

  • Typst writer:

    • Use ~ for nonbreaking space, and escape literal ~ (#9010).
    • Put the label in right place for Div, use #block (#8991). Previously we were putting the label at the beginning of the Div‚Äôs contents, but according to the documentation such a label gets attached to the preceding element. We now use an explicit #block and add the label at the end.

  • LaTeX writer:

    • Improve escaping of URIs in href, url (#8992).
    • Improve internal links and targets (#8744). We no longer wrap section headings in a \hypertarget. This is unnecessary (hyperref creates an anchor based on the label) and it interferes with tagging. In addition, we now use \hyperref rather than \hyperlink for internal links. Currently \hypertarget is still being used for link anchors not on headings. Thanks to @u-fischer.

  • HTML format templates (style.html): Fix typo in clause for svg (Jackson Schuster).

  • Use lastest texmath, typst-symbols, typst. Targets typst 0.7.

item.title: Release notes from tensorflow: TensorFlow 2.14.0-rc0
item.content:encoded:
Release 2.14.0

Tensorflow

Breaking Changes

  • tf.Tensor

    • The class hierarchy for tf.Tensor has changed, and there are now explicit EagerTensor and SymbolicTensor classes for eager and tf.function respectively. Users who relied on the exact type of Tensor (e.g. type(t) == tf.Tensor) will need to update their code to use isinstance(t, tf.Tensor). The tf.is_symbolic_tensor helper added in 2.13 may be used when it is necessary to determine if a value is specifically a symbolic tensor.

  • tf.compat.v1.Session

    • tf.compat.v1.Session.partial_run and tf.compat.v1.Session.partial_run_setup will be deprecated in the next release.

Known Caveats

  • tf.lite
    • when converter flag "_experimenal_use_buffer_offset" is enabled, additional metadata is automatically excluded from the generated model. The behaviour is the same as "exclude_conversion_metadata" is set
    • If the model is larger than 2GB, then we also require "exclude_conversion_metadata" flag to be set

Major Features and Improvements

  • Enable JIT-compiled i64-indexed kernels on GPU for large tensors with more than 2**32 elements.

    • Unary GPU kernels: Abs, Atanh, Acos, Acosh, Asin, Asinh, Atan, Cos, Cosh, Sin, Sinh, Tan, Tanh.
    • Binary GPU kernels: AddV2, Sub, Div, DivNoNan, Mul, MulNoNan, FloorDiv, Equal, NotEqual, Greater, GreaterEqual, LessEqual, Less.

  • tf.lite

    • Add experimental supports conversion of models that may be larger than 2GB before buffer deduplication

Bug Fixes and Other Changes

  • tf.py_function and tf.numpy_function can now be used as function decorators for clearer code:

    @tf.py_function(Tout=tf.float32)
def my_fun(x):
  print("This always executes eagerly.")
  return x+1

  • tf.lite

    • Strided_Slice now supports UINT32.

  • tf.config.experimental.enable_tensor_float_32_execution

    • Disabling TensorFloat-32 execution now causes TPUs to use float32 precision for float32 matmuls and other ops. TPUs have always used bfloat16 precision for certain ops, like matmul, when such ops had float32 inputs. Now, disabling TensorFloat-32 by calling tf.config.experimental.enable_tensor_float_32_execution(False) will cause TPUs to use float32 precision for such ops instead of bfloat16.

  • tf.experimental.dtensor

    • API changes for Relayout. Added a new API, dtensor.relayout_like, for relayouting a tensor according to the layout of another tensor.
    • Added dtensor.get_default_mesh, for retrieving the current default mesh under the dtensor context.
    • *fft* ops now support dtensors with any layout. Fixed bug in 'fft2d/ fft3d', 'ifft2d/ifft3d', 'rfft2d/rfft3d', and 'irfft2d/irfft3d' for sharded input.

  • tf.experimental.strict_mode

    • Added a new API, strict_mode, which converts all deprecation warnings into runtime errors with instructions on switching to a recommended substitute.

  • TensorFlow Debugger (tfdbg) CLI: ncurses-based CLI for tfdbg v1 was removed.

  • TensorFlow now supports C++ RTTI on mobile and Android. To enable this feature, pass the flag --define=tf_force_rtti=true to Bazel when building TensorFlow. This may be needed when linking TensorFlow into RTTI-enabled programs since mixing RTTI and non-RTTI code can cause ABI issues.

  • tf.ones, tf.zeros, tf.fill, tf.ones_like, tf.zeros_like now take an additional Layout argument that controls the output layout of their results.

  • tf.nest and tf.data now support user defined classes implementing __tf_flatten__ and __tf_unflatten__ methods. See nest_util code examples for an example.

Keras

Keras is a framework built on top of the TensorFlow. See more details on the Keras website.

Major Features and Improvements

  • tf.keras
    • Model.compile now support steps_per_execution='auto' as a parameter, allowing automatic tuning of steps per execution during Model.fit, Model.predict, and Model.evaluate for a significant performance boost.

Thanks to our Contributors

This release contains contributions from many people at Google, as well as:

Aakar Dwivedi, Adrian Popescu, ag.ramesh, Akhil Goel, Albert Zeyer, Alex Rosen, Alexey Vishnyakov, Andrew Goodbody, angerson, Ashiq Imran, Ayan Moitra, Ben Barsdell, Bhavani Subramanian, Boian Petkantchin, BrianWieder, Chris Mc, cloudhan, Connor Flanagan, Daniel Lang, Daniel Yudelevich, Darya Parygina, David Korczynski, David Svantesson, dingyuqing05, Dragan Mladjenovic, dskkato, Eli Kobrin, Erick Ochoa, Erik Schultheis, Fr√©d√©ric Bastien, gaikwadrahul8, Gauri1 Deshpande, georgiie, guozhong.zhuang, H. Vetinari, Isaac Cilia Attard, Jake Hall, Jason Furmanek, Jerry Ge, Jinzhe Zeng, JJ, johnnkp, Jonathan Albrecht, jongkweh, justkw, Kanvi Khanna, kikoxia, Koan-Sin Tan, Kun-Lu, Learning-To-Play, ltsai1, Lu Teng, luliyucoordinate, Mahmoud Abuzaina, mdfaijul, Milos Puzovic, Nathan Luehr, Om Thakkar, pateldeev, Peng Sun, Philipp Hack, pjpratik, Poliorcetics, rahulbatra85, rangjiaheng, Renato Arantes, Robert Kalmar, roho, Rylan Justice, Sachin Muradi, samypr100, Saoirse Stewart, Shanbin Ke, Shivam Mishra, shuw, Song Ziming, Stephan Hartmann, Sulav, sushreebarsa, T Coxon, Tai Ly, talyz, Tensorflow Jenkins, Thibaut Goetghebuer-Planchon, Thomas Preud'Homme, tilakrayal, Tirumalesh, Tj Xu, Tom Allsop, Trevor Morris, Varghese, Jojimon, Wen Chen, Yaohui Liu, Yimei Sun, Zhoulong Jiang, Zhoulong, Jiang
